alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bryan; Coastal Chatham; Coastal Liberty; Coastal McIntosh (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued June 04 at 3:36PM EDT until June 05 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the High Rip Current Risk, dangerous rip currents. For the Coastal Flood Advisory, up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected along shorelines and tidal waterways (10.2 to 10.4 feet Mean Lower Low Water at Fort Pulaski). * WHERE...Coastal Bryan, Coastal Chatham, Coastal Liberty and Coastal McIntosh Counties. * WHEN...For the High Rip Current Risk, until 8 PM EDT this evening. For the Coastal Flood Advisory, until midnight EDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Saltwater inundation will impact some roads. Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High tide will occur around 9:15 PM today at Fort Pulaski. Saltwater inundation will be possible 2 to 3 hours before and after high tide. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Fort Pulaski GA MLLW Categories - Minor 9.5 ft, Moderate 10.0 ft, Major 10.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.0 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.0 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 04/09 PM 10.3 2.8 2.0 N/A Moderate 05/10 AM 8.5 1.0 1.8 N/A None 05/10 PM 9.6 2.1 1.4 N/A Minor 06/10 AM 8.3 0.8 1.7 N/A None 06/11 PM 9.0 1.5 0.9 N/A None 07/11 AM 7.3 -0.2 0.7 N/A None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. Visit water.weather.gov for additional water level and flood impact information. Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bryan; Coastal Chatham; Coastal Liberty; Coastal McIntosh
